title: Windows 7 Installation Commemoration (R.I.P. Windows 7) - Krazy Ken’s Tech Misadventures
tags: Windows 7 Installation Commemoration (R.I.P. Windows 7) - Krazy Ken’s Tech Misadventures
description: Microsoft Windows 7 has reached end of life (EOL) and extended support is over. But were not done yet! Were gonna celebrate with an installation commemoration and a house party!  Special thanks to Linode for sponsoring this video! Fulfill your cloud computing needs, and sign up now (plus save $20 with my code: COMPCLAN20)    Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - Windows 7 Installation Commemoration (R.I.P. Windows 7)  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   SPECIAL THANKS to the collaborators who made this episode possible! Bob Hoerz - Delivery Man Naked Dave - Camera Op and Guest 4 Mirrations |  - Guest 2 Ken Hoerz | dA: LoneWolf-FoxHunter - Guest 3  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards  #LongLiveWindows7 #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
